summary: A unitâ€‘test collection that verifies the Ansible common warning utilities, ensuring deprecation warnings are generated with correct version, collection and date information, that warning messages are captured and aggregated properly, and that the warning emission function behaves as expected even under failure conditions.
business_intent: Guarantee that warning and deprecation mechanisms in Ansible modules work reliably, providing clear user notifications and supporting safe deprecation workflows to maintain code quality and backward compatibility.
